item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: richalex2010
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: What We Do
item.dc:creator: richalex2010
item.content:encoded:
Every business can use a bit of help sometimes. That's where X Factor comes in! We work with small businesses to provide creative solutions, all while working within their schedules and budgets. Select a category below to learn more.

 

Our Services

Technology

Technology should make business easier, not harder. Our experienced professionals are here to help your business harness the full potential of its technology.

Marketing

Great businesses need great marketing. X Factor can help you break through the noise and stand apart from your competition, on the street and on the web.

Training

X Factor provides customized training in key areas such as management,communication and customer service to help businesses attract and retain top talent.

  Want to learn more about out Services? Contact Us

item.title: Contact Us

item.content:encoded:
Contact Us

Want to learn more about our services or schedule a meeting to sit down and chat about what we can do for your business? Contact our Round Rock office below.

item.title: Who We Are
item.dc:creator: richalex2010
item.content:encoded:
Who We Are

Learn more about our people

X Factor is a different kind of consulting company: we're a family-owned business that understands the unique challenges every entrepreneur faces. We've been there, and now we're here to help others! Our schedules are flexible, our rates are competitive, and our clients' needs always come first. If your organization is ready to take the next step in business, contact us today!

Our Experience

Our people have worked with a wide variety of companies and organizations large and small. We've used our decades of experience to assist in the growth and development of organizations such as:​

  • Restaurants
  • Service Companies
  • Publishing Companies
  • Real Estate Agencies
  • Religious Organizations
  • Quasi-Public Organizations
  • Science Museums
  • Colleges & Universities
  • Insurance Companies & Agencies
  • 3D Printing Companies
  • Video Game Developers
  • And many more!
Want to learn more about what out people can do for your business? Contact Us

item.title: FAQs
item.dc:creator: richalex2010
item.content:encoded:
X Factor FAQs

Frequently Asked Questions

Have a question about our services? Take a look at our FAQs below or Contact Us today!

Q: How much will it cost to use X Factor's services?

Our initial consultation is absolutely free! Once we've met, we'll draft a proposal based on what we've discussed. It will outline the details and costs of further services (most of our services are priced on a project basis). For some services (such as Tech Support & Troubleshooting) we also offer per month contracts at discounted rates to make budgeting that much easier.

Q: How should I prepare for a meeting with X Factor?

You'll want to make available any relevant information that will help us understand your business and goals so our proposal can be right on target.

Q: Where can we meet?

Our consultants are happy to come to your office or meet at a mutually convenient location (many home office-based business owners prefer this). If you'd rather meet virtually or are located out of commuting distance, we can host a video call instead.

Q: How do I schedule a meeting?

To schedule an appointment with X Factor, you can call us at 512-428-4178 or email us at contact@xfactorconsultants.com

Want to learn more about what X Factor can do for your business?  Contact Us

item.title: Technology
item.dc:creator: richalex2010
item.content:encoded:
Technology

Make your tech work for you

Technology Services

Tech Support

Are your computers experiencing slow downs, crashes, and other problems? We offer remote and on-site support and troubleshooting services for your office computer network, e-mail services, and other business and IT systems.

Software Training

Do your employees need help using your business software more effectively and efficiently? Our coaching and training services can help your business leverage the full potential of the technology and software you'd like to be using as well as what you already have.

Upgrades & Replacements

We can help plan and execute technology replacement and upgrades for your business, and find more cost effective (and even free) alternatives to commonly used business software without having to sacrifice quality of service.

Want to learn more about our Technology Services?  Contact Us
